## Events

Our events are educational in nature, learner-centered, and open to the public. 

However, you must register and be in touch with a member of the lab.

### census-users group

Every Thursday at 5:00pm ET via Zoom (30 minutes).

### text-users group

Fourth Thursday of each month at 5:30pm ET via Zoom (60 minutes).
